messages.content:
[
  {
    "screen_number": 1,
    "voiceover_text": "Are your teams struggling with fragmented workflows and missed deadlines?",
    "target_duration_sec": 7,
    "screen_type": "slides/text overlay",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "frustrated team members, cluttered digital workspace, red warning icons",
    "action_notes": "Quick montage of stressed professionals, overlapping apps, and missed deadline alerts"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 2,
    "voiceover_text": "Introducing FlowSync: the all-in-one platform designed to unify your project management.",
    "target_duration_sec": 7,
    "screen_type": "slides/text overlay",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "FlowSync logo animation, modern UI elements, brand colors",
    "action_notes": "Logo reveal with smooth transition to product interface"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 3,
    "voiceover_text": "With FlowSync’s unified dashboard, manage every project from a single, intuitive workspace.",
    "target_duration_sec": 7,
    "screen_type": "screencast",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "dashboard overview, project cards, navigation bar",
    "action_notes": "Screen recording of dashboard navigation, highlighting project overview"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 4,
    "voiceover_text": "Collaborate in real-time with built-in chat, file sharing, and instant task assignments.",
    "target_duration_sec": 7,
    "screen_type": "screencast",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "team chat window, file upload, assigning tasks",
    "action_notes": "Cursor demonstrates sending a message, uploading a file, and assigning a task"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 5,
    "voiceover_text": "Leverage AI-powered analytics to track progress and identify bottlenecks before they slow you down.",
    "target_duration_sec": 7,
    "screen_type": "slides/text overlay",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "AI analytics graphs, progress bars, alert icons",
    "action_notes": "Animated charts and graphs updating in real time"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 6,
    "voiceover_text": "Seamlessly integrate with your favorite productivity apps—no more switching between tools.",
    "target_duration_sec": 7,
    "screen_type": "slides/text overlay",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "integration logos: Slack, Google Drive, Trello, Outlook",
    "action_notes": "Icons animate in and connect to FlowSync interface"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 7,
    "voiceover_text": "Customize notifications and automate workflows to keep your team aligned and proactive.",
    "target_duration_sec": 7,
    "screen_type": "screencast",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "notification settings, workflow automation builder",
    "action_notes": "User sets up a custom notification and creates an automation rule"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 8,
    "voiceover_text": "Perfect for cross-functional and remote teams managing complex projects from anywhere.",
    "target_duration_sec": 7,
    "screen_type": "stock video",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "diverse remote teams on video calls, collaborative workspaces",
    "action_notes": "Footage of professionals collaborating remotely, sharing screens"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 9,
    "voiceover_text": "Let’s see FlowSync in action: Log in, create a project, and invite your team in seconds.",
    "target_duration_sec": 7,
    "screen_type": "screencast",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "login screen, new project creation, invite dialog",
    "action_notes": "Step-by-step UI walkthrough of onboarding process"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 10,
    "voiceover_text": "Collaborate instantly—chat, share files, and assign tasks, all in one place.",
    "target_duration_sec": 7,
    "screen_type": "screencast",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "real-time chat, file sharing, task assignment",
    "action_notes": "Live demo of team members interacting in the platform"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 11,
    "voiceover_text": "Monitor progress with AI analytics and automate routine updates for maximum efficiency.",
    "target_duration_sec": 7,
    "screen_type": "slides/text overlay",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "AI dashboard, automation triggers, efficiency metrics",
    "action_notes": "Highlighting analytics dashboard and automation setup"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 12,
    "voiceover_text": "Ready to transform your workflow? Visit our website to learn more and start your free trial today!",
    "target_duration_sec": 7,
    "screen_type": "cta",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "website URL, free trial button, FlowSync branding",
    "action_notes": "Narrator on camera, direct address, CTA overlay with animated button"
  }
]
